template.description: Basic ExecuteRuleEngine Example. Reads a CSV file, executes rules against the individual fields of each row and creates a flow file for each row which passed the business logic.
template.name: ExecuteRuleEngine Example

labels.label:
Sample Flow with the RuleEngine
- GetFile: Get a CSV File - SplitText: Split the CSV file into chunks of rows - RuleEngine: Run business rules against the individual fields (the ruleengine splits the CSV row into individual fields) of the row from the CSV file - Route OnAttribute: route the flowfile based on if the business rules passed or failed - UpdateAttribute: update the filename - PutFile: output the CSV rows that passed the business logic to individual files
